pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://github.com/alisw/alibuild/workflows/Python%20package/badge.svgaliBuild========A simple build tool for ALICE experiment software and its externals. Recipesfor the externals and ALICE software are stored in`alidist <https://github.com/alisw/alidist>`_.Instant gratification with:: pip install alibuild git clone https://github.com/alisw/alidist.git aliBuild build AliRoot alienv enter AliRoot/latest aliroot -bFull documentation at:https://alisw.github.io/alibuildPre-requisites==============If you are using aliBuild directly from git clone, you should make sureyou have `pyyaml` and `argparse` in your python distribution.
